HGE::System_Launch

Launches an URL or external executable/data file. 

void System_Launch(
  const char *url
);

Parameters

url
An executable file name, data file name or internet URL to be opened with default associated application.

Remarks

You can use System_Launch to open Web sites with default browser or to start a new mail message. Just use standard URL syntax.

Requirements

Header: hge.h
Import library: hge.lib
